colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES RGYAL BA THAMS CAD KYI MKHYEN BRTZE GCIG TU BSDUS PA'I NGO BO, LNGA BRGYA PA RNAMS KYI BTZUG GI NOR BU DPAL SNAN BLA MA DAM PA RJE BTZUN BTZONG KHA PA CHEN PO NYID KYI RNAM PAR THAR PA MDO TZAM ZHIG BRJOD PA'I SGO NAS GSOL 'DEBS PA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA 'DI NI, SNGO GONG NAS DGE SBYONNG SDOM BRTZON MCHOG BZANG LA SOGS PA MANG PO ZHIG GIS NAN CHER BSKUL ZHING, PHYIS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN NYI MA SNYING POS YANG YANG BSKUL SHING ,RNAM THAR GYI SGO NAS GSOL BA 'DEBS PA SNYAN DNGAGS KYI BRDAS MA BCINGS PA'I GO BDE BAR BRJOD PA ZHIG BGYIS ZHES GSUNG BA DANG ,BDAG NYID MCHOG TU DAD PAS KYANG NYE BAR BSKUL TE, RJE BTZUN BLA MA DE NYID KYI ZHABS KYI PADMO LA NYE BAR GDUGS PA'I BKA' DRIN GYIS 'TSO BA, MANG DU THOS PA'I BTZUN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS SBYAR BA PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,@004A *, ,SKYE ZHING SKYE BDAG NI THAMS CAD DU, ,RIGS BZANG BLO GSAL NGAG RGYAL MED PA DANG , ,SNYING RJE CHE ZHING BLA MA LA GUS PAS, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MA'I DAM TSIG LA GNAS SHOG ,TSE RABS KUN TU RGYAL BA BTZONG KHA PAS, ,THEG MCHOG BSHES GNYEN DNGOS SU MDZAD PA'I MTHUS, ,RGYAL BAS BSNGAGS PA'I LAM BZANG DE NYID LAS, ,SKAD CIG TZAM YANG LDOG PAR MA GYUR CIG ,DGE BA 'DI YIS TSE RABS KUN TU BDAG ,MTSUNGS MED BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I ZHABS DRUNG DU, ,SA DANG LAM GYI RIM PA MTHAR SONG NAS, ,'GRO KUN SANGS RGYAS SA LA 'GOD PAR SHOG , ,,)
